comments.body: Can we please have a description of what we're testing here. Also, what is 1866? The module name should be in camel case. And we need a copyright header.
Added a comment, and the copyright. Why the camelcase? I want to separate the test name and additional metadata (ticket number and whether it's before and after the fix)
Oh, 1866 is a ticket number. This module is not named after the file. Also, `..._1866_before` and `..._after_1866` are not particularly consistent.

diffHunk:
